T-SQL.Title: BREAK
T-SQL.Content: THROW 50000, 'This script should not be run as a whole. It contains manual operations (step-by-step).';

T-SQL.Title: SELECT
T-SQL.Content: SELECT TOP 100{Enter}{Tab}t.*{Enter}FROM <table-name> AS t WITH (NOLOCK){Enter}-- WHERE{Up}{Left 2}{Shift Down}{Right 12}{Shift Up}

T-SQL.Title: DIFF <mine-table> <their-table>
T-SQL.Content: WITH Theirs AS{Enter}({Enter}{Tab}SELECT *{Enter}{Tab}FROM <TheirTable>{Enter}){Enter},Mine AS{Enter}({Enter}{Tab}SELECT *{Enter}{Tab}FROM <MineTable>{Enter}){Enter}{Tab}SELECT 'THEIRS-ONLY', L.* FROM{Enter}{Tab}({Enter}{Tab}{Tab}SELECT * FROM Theirs{Enter}{Tab}{Tab}EXCEPT{Enter}{Tab}{Tab}SELECT * FROM Mine{Enter}{Tab}) AS L{Enter 2}{Tab}UNION ALL{Enter 2}{Tab}SELECT 'MINE-ONLY', R.* FROM{Enter}{Tab}({Enter}{Tab}{Tab}SELECT * FROM Mine{Enter}{Tab}{Tab}EXCEPT{Enter}{Tab}{Tab}SELECT * FROM Theirs{Enter}{Tab}) AS R{Enter})

GIT.Title: Branch.Push
GIT.Description: Pushes a newly created branch to the remote repository and sets it to track the remote branch.

GIT.Title: Log.Graph
GIT.Description: Displays a compact and visually appealing view of the commit history across all branches.

GIT.Title: Log.Search.ByAuthor
GIT.Description: Displays a compact and visually appealing view of the commit history across all branches.
